questions.name: question1
questions.html: Speedy Stream wants to improve the current prototype. To decide what to prioritize, we want your feedback on the current prototype you saw on the previous page (before any improvement). Please answer the following question: how critical are the improvements on each video element in the current prototype for you to understand the content in a weather forecast video?

rows.text: Audio Quality: The sound of the audio is clear and not muffled
Video Resolution: The visuals of the video are clear and not pixelated
Audio Stability: The audio is smooth and does not stutter
Motion Smoothness: The video visuals play smoothly and do not jitter
Audio-Video Syncronization: The audio and visuals are in sync

questions.name: likert-text
questions.title: In a few sentences, tell us why you think some elements are more critical than others?
